sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_MON as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_TUE as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_WED as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_THU as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_FRI as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_SAT as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_SUN as string,
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_MON as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_TUE as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_WED as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_THU as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_FRI as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_SAT as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_SUN as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_MON,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_TUE,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_WED,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_THU,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_FRI,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_SAT,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY_SUN
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
